hotel_inform_search_criteria: I can narrow the search down by name of the hotel, its location, price or rating.
hotel_ask_name: What Hotel would you like to stay at?
hotel_ask_location: Any particular location you would like to stay at?
hotel_ask_price: What price range are you looking for?
hotel_inform_price: The '{hotel_name:s}' is in the {price_range:s} price range
hotel_ask_rating: Do you have any preferences ratingwise?
hotel_inform_rating: The '{hotel_name:s}' has an average rating of {average_rating:d}
hotel_provide_search_result:
OK, I have found the '{hotel_name:s}', located {hotel_location:s}. It is in the {price_range:s} price category and has an
average rating of {average_rating:d}. It does {has_service:s} and it does {takes_reservations:s}.
hotel_ask_search_more: Would you like to search for any more hotels?
